content: All of the figures that are included here are views from the rear of the system. The common building blocks are displayed and range from 1 - 4 frames, with various numbers of CPC drawers and PCIe+ I/O drawers. This chapter includes the following topics:  “Power Distribution Unit configurations” on page 530  “Bulk Power Assembly configurations” on page 533 E 530 IBM z16 (3931) Technical Guide Power Distribution Unit configurations The various PDU-based system configurations are shown in Figure E-1 - Figure E-6 on page 532. Figure E-1 Single frame Figure E-2 Two frames AZ Appendix E. Frame configurations Power Distribution Units and Bulk Power Assembly-based systems 531 Figure E-3 Two frames AB Figure E-4 Three frames ZAC 532 IBM z16 (3931) Technical Guide Figure E-5 Three frames ZAB Figure E-6 Four frames ZABC, PDU Appendix E. Frame configurations Power Distribution Units and Bulk Power Assembly-based systems 533 Bulk Power Assembly configurations The BPA-based system configurations
